Draconic Torrent [Attack Technique].name: Draconic Torrent [Attack Technique]
Draconic Torrent [Attack Technique].fullText:
Initiate of the Dragon Attack 11Draconic Torrent [Attack Technique]

Like the dragons you seek to emulate, you leap into the air and unleash a torrent of fiery energy upon your enemies.

Encounter        Fire, Full Discipline, Implement, Psionic
Standard Action      Close blast 5

Target: Each creature in the blast

Attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier fire damage.


Draconic Torrent [Movement Technique]

Like the dragons you seek to emulate, you leap into the air and unleash a torrent of fiery energy upon your enemies.

Encounter      Fire, Full Discipline, Psionic
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You fly your speed. You can end this movement in midair. At the end of your turn, you fall but take no falling damage.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 77.
Draconic Torrent [Attack Technique].flavor: Like the dragons you seek to emulate, you leap into the air and unleash a torrent of fiery energy upon your enemies.
Draconic Torrent [Attack Technique].effect: You fly your speed. You can end this movement in midair. At the end of your turn, you fall but take no falling damage.

Draconic Avatar.name: Draconic Avatar
Draconic Avatar.fullText:
Initiate of the Dragon Attack 20Draconic Avatar

You unleash a gout of flame as you transform into a shape between a humanoid and a dragon. Wings surge from your back, your hands grow long, sharp talons, and your skin becomes as hard as a dragon’s scales.

Daily        Fire, Implement, Polymorph, Psionic
Standard Action      Close blast 5

Target: Each creature in the blast

Attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d8 + Dexterity modifier fire damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: You can assume the form of the dragon. Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC, a +4 power bonus to damage rolls with monk powers and initiate of the dragon powers, and a fly speed equal to your speed.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 77.
Draconic Avatar.flavor: You unleash a gout of flame as you transform into a shape between a humanoid and a dragon. Wings surge from your back, your hands grow long, sharp talons, and your skin becomes as hard as a dragon’s scales.
Draconic Avatar.effect: You can assume the form of the dragon. Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC, a +4 power bonus to damage rolls with monk powers and initiate of the dragon powers, and a fly speed equal to your speed.

Dragon's Vengeance.name: Dragon's Vengeance
Dragon's Vengeance.fullText:
Initiate of the Dragon Utility 12Dragon's Vengeance

When your enemy earns your ire by wounding you, the heat of dragon’s fire washes off you in waves.

Daily        Fire, Psionic, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you while you are bloodied takes 5 fire damage.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 77.
Dragon's Vengeance.flavor: When your enemy earns your ire by wounding you, the heat of dragon’s fire washes off you in waves.
Dragon's Vengeance.effect: Until the stance ends, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you while you are bloodied takes 5 fire damage.
